ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound grilled skinless, boneless chicken breast, diced
½ cup finely chopped red onion
¼ cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing

cookingTips: Grill chicken breasts and let cool before dicing to ensure proper cooking
Prepare avocado last and toss gently with other ingredients to avoid breaking pieces
Use fresh cilantro and squeeze lime in dressing for bright flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to time this salad so all components are fresh and avocado doesn't brown?
